summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Fractal Multi-Asset Engine. Backend API testing showed 87.5% success rate with most core endpoints working. Frontend has significant compilation errors preventing proper operation.

critical_bugs.impact: BTC fractal terminal functionality not available

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: 500 error - 'Insufficient walk steps: 1. Need at least 6.'

ui_bugs.issue: Page loads with compilation errors overlay blocking UI

integration_issues.issue: Continuous WebSocket connection failures - prevents real-time updates
